attributes.background:
I am looking to get as many signatures as possible to raise to the FA and Sky that they need to stop changing around football fixtures to other weeknights. This season in the championship i have some stats of game that have been moves:
Wolves-14
Leeds and Boro-13
Derby-12

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of the Football Association and broadcasters.
